## R Markdown

Load Libraries
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(party)
```

Load Data frame 

```{r}
df <- read.csv("2013_AAA_Data_for_Tree.csv")

```

Split the data into a training set and test set (75% of data to training and 25 % of training to Test).

```{r}
n = nrow(df)
train = sample(1:n, size = round(0.75*n), replace=FALSE)
df.train = df[train,]
df.test = df[-train,]
```


Build the decision tree

```{r}

aaa_2013j_tree <- ctree(final_result ~ dataplus + forumng + glossary + homepage + oucollaborate + oucontent + resource + subpage + url, data=df.train)

```

Plot the tree

```{r}

plot(aaa_2013j_tree)

```

Test the deciscion tree

```{r}
df.test$prediction <- predict(aaa_2013j_tree, df.test)

```
